name: pure-javascript
description: Routing and styles[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D, modules and style

scripts.build: npm run process-styles && babel src -d dist
scripts.start: npm run process-styles && cd src && live-server --port=3000 --entry-file='index.html'
scripts.compile-styles: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/stylesheets/scss/styles.scss src/stylesheets/css/styles.css
scripts.process-styles: npm run compile-styles && npm run css-minify
